document.full_text: the gunfire at the border was the first clash between thailand and cambodia since four days of artillery duels and gunfire in february at the preah vihear temple.
document.title: asia: thailand: clash between thai and cambodian forces
lines_and_colors: the gunfire at the border was the first clash between thailand and cambodia since four days of artillery duels and gunfire in february at the preah vihear temple.
